com.jcabi.github

Interface Hooks


  • @Immutable
public interface Hooks
    Github hooks.
    Since:
    0.8
    Version:
    $Id: 201c2c4c3217fe9e63960003e92410209ae3509b $
    Author:
    Paul Polishchuk (ppol@ua.fm)
    See Also:
    Hooks API

      • create

        Hook create(String name,
            Map<String,String> config,
            boolean active)
     throws IOException
        Create new hook.
        Parameters:
        name - Hook name
        config - Configuration for the hook
        active - Actually trigger the hook when the events occur?
        Returns:
        Hook
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is any I/O problem
        See Also:
        Create a hook
        To do:
        #1106:30min Add support for the "events" parameter of the hook creation API. It's a list of strings of the names of events which the hook will be triggered for.
